title: Peter and the wolf
creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions and Clyde Geronimi
brief_description: Disney’s animated version of “Peter and the Wolf” follows several years after his classic film “Fantasia”. Disney continues his use of music and detailed animation with music from Sergei Prokofiev matched to the characters of the story. Each character is introduced at the beginning of the tale with their appropriate musical instrument from the orchestra. Suitable for primary school level.
